vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥουβήν, ὁ indecl., (Heb. רְאוּבֵן),
Reuben: Rev.7:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Reuben, "See, a son! [<ref='Gen.29.32'>Ge. 29:32</ref>]; substitute a son"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.32;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Leah (H3812);
brother of: Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783);
half-brother of: Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Hanoch (H2585J), Pallu (H6396), Hezron (H2696) and Carmi (H3756)
§ Reuben, "See, a son! [Ge. 29:32]; substitute a son"
Reuben, (Proper name), indeclinable, Rev. 7:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
流便 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "看阿！一個兒子"
雅各的長子，由利亞所生 #啟 7:5|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
流便 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "看阿！一个儿子"
雅各的长子，由利亚所生 #启 7:5|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ru-bên «nầy, một con trai » Con đầu lòng của Gia-cốp.
